ISSUE.TITLE: Can't make drone itself
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I'm using CentOS 6.5, go version go1.2.2 linux/amd64 Steps: 0. git clone https://github.com/drone/drone/; cd drone 1. make And it failed: cd cmd/droned/assets && find js -name "_.js" ! -name '._' ! -name "main.js" -exec cat {} \; > js/main.js cd cmd/droned && rice embed cd pkg/template && rice embed go build -o bin/drone -ldflags "-X main.version 0.2dev-3e3367c" github.com/drone/drone/cmd/drone can't load package: package github.com/drone/drone/cmd/drone: cannot find package "github.com/drone/drone/cmd/drone" in any of: /usr/lib/golang/src/pkg/github.com/drone/drone/cmd/drone (from $GOROOT) ($GOPATH not set) make: **\* [build] Error 1 How should I fix it? Thank you.
